========================================================
  EARTH-2 RTX DEPLOYMENT INSTRUCTIONS - February 5, 2026
========================================================

STATUS: Code pushed to GitHub. Ready for VM deployment.
BLOCKER: SSH key needs to be authorized on Sandbox VM.

========================================================
STEP 1: SET UP SSH ACCESS (One-time)
========================================================

Open a NEW terminal window (PowerShell, Git Bash, or Terminal) and run:

  ssh-copy-id mycosoft@192.168.0.187

Enter the password when prompted. After this, SSH will work without passwords.

Alternative (if ssh-copy-id not available):

  ssh mycosoft@192.168.0.187
  # Enter password
  # Then run on VM:
  mkdir -p ~/.ssh
  echo "ssh-rsa  admin2@MycoComp" >> ~/.ssh/authorized_keys
  chmod 600 ~/.ssh/authorized_keys
  exit

========================================================
STEP 2: DEPLOY TO SANDBOX VM
========================================================

Once SSH is configured, run:

  ssh mycosoft@192.168.0.187

Then on the VM:

  cd /home/mycosoft/website
  git fetch origin && git reset --hard origin/main
  
  # Verify GPU
  nvidia-smi
  
  # Deploy K8s resources
  kubectl apply -f infra/k8s/namespaces.yaml
  kubectl apply -f infra/k8s/storage/earth2-pvc.yaml
  
  # Deploy Earth-2 models
  chmod +x infra/k8s/deploy-all-models.sh
  ./infra/k8s/deploy-all-models.sh
  
  # Deploy E2CC
  cd services/e2cc
  docker compose up -d --build
  
  # Verify
  kubectl get pods -n earth2-models
  docker ps

========================================================
STEP 3: RUN VERIFICATION TESTS
========================================================

From local machine (after deployment):

  python tests/e2e/test_rtx5090_passthrough.py --remote 192.168.0.187
  python tests/e2e/test_services_comprehensive.py --host 192.168.0.187
  python tests/e2e/earth2_rtx_e2e_test.py --host 192.168.0.187

========================================================
